name: Monkey
overview: Written as a Backbone demo game by Monolith Designs this game is a fairly simple but fast moving platform game. It makes use of menus to allow the player to pick which level to play as well as weapons in the game itself. The baddys are mostly simple with the exception of the tank, which can shoot back at the player. You can choose 3 different maps, Grassy Island, Snowy Island or Desert Island.
